title: MamunMKY
author: MamunMKY
created_time: April 10, 2023, 05:00:16 AMLast edit: April 11, 2023, 03:48:14 AM by MamunMKY
content: Website Twitter Telegram Bounty group ★ Bounty campaign will be managed by Crypto Networks Community ★ 19K BCHEC token are allocated for this Bounty. ★ The bounty program was launched on 08.04.2023 and will run until 22.04.2023★ Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.Crypto Networks team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.★ General Rules★All Participants Must join BCHEC Social Media And (Bounty Group)  ★Once rejected he will not be accepted again Participants cannot change their wallet address after registration, Must be double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign★Talking About The Bounty in The Project Chat Group Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign And An Instant Ban From The Company Chat Group★Please Ask Your Bounty related Questions in the Crypto Networks Group★Please Note That Any Offensive or inappropriate Behavour Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign *Using Multiple Accounts, Cheating And Spanning Are Not Allowed★KYC not necessary for this campaign All Participants Must Send The Proof of Authentication Post To Join The Bounty Program  And give a positive feedback in the comment.Important rule : You must be a  Newbie with 30 minimum activityTwitter 50%Telegram 50%Week 1: 10/04-17/04Week 2: 18/04-25/04Wwek 3: 26/04-02/05Week 4: 03/05-09/05Week 5: 10/05-17/05Week 6: 18/05-24/05Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Twitter Campaign 250 Members Telegram Campaign 150 Members★If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form belowComplaint Form Complaint Spreadsheet Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow BCHEC Twitter Page,2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #BTC #Airdrop #BNB #ETH #usdt #Bitcoin #bitchemicaldefihashtags in every retweet or tweet.JOIN NOW: https://forms.gle/KeyoiAT8KsE2WW6s5Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | BCHEC Coin.(Example: Crypto Networks | BCHEC Coin)2. Replace your profile picture with BCHEC Coin.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear BCHEC avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes                                                  avatar                                                  Download                                       JOIN NOW: https://forms.gle/4BjNVUXFwYUN26Uk8
